scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes research files related to a series of Spanish Civil War history projects and books on which Calese collaborated with Alvah Bessie, Carl Geiser, Randall B. Smith and others. Contains copies of SCW-era (and some later) correspondence, documents, ephemera and publications, including material in Spanish and Russian.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. For more information, please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing decisions made prior to 2024 were not documented.

In December 2024, materials in Box 1 were rehoused into three manuscript boxes and a flat box. Loose materials were placed into archival folders and the finding aid was updated to reflect these changes.
